North_Las_Vegas.Fiesta Rancho:
Fiesta Rancho is a hotel and casino located on 25.46 acres (10.30 ha) of land at 2400 North Rancho Drive in Las Vegas, Nevada, across the street from Texas Station in North Las Vegas.
The hotel-casino opened as the Fiesta in 1994. It was owned and operated by the Maloof family until its sale to Station Casinos in 2001.
